case.state: Huh, so we take off something when we lose a hand. I guess I'll join this weird game?

Whose bedroom is thi---Hah, jinx!

~cards~!! This hand is perfection!

~cards~ cards.

~cards~!! ~cards~ cards!
~cards~ cards! (I really hope this is good enough!)
~cards~...
YeeeeEEEEESSSSSSS!!! YES!! YEEESSSSSS!!!

Safe!

WOOHOO!

AAAAAAAAAH!! (Wait, why are we screaming?)

You wanna know my favorite sex position, Kyu?

"Socks" to be me. (I didn't make that joke before, right?)
